

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
survey_data <- read_csv("People of the Guana Peninsula Survey_October 3, 2022_12.36.csv")


library(janitor)
# get the first row as the col names
survey_data_q <-
  survey_data %>%
  row_to_names(row_number = 1)

```


```{r}
# Q1: Have you visited the GTM Research Reserve?
survey_data_q  %>%
  select(`Have you visited the GTM Research Reserve?`) %>%
  ggplot() +
    aes(`Have you visited the GTM Research Reserve?`) +
    geom_bar()
```


```{r}
# Q2: When you come to the Guana Tolomato Matanzas (GTM) Research Reserve, what kind of activities do you engage in?
survey_data_q  %>%
  select(`When you visit the GTM Research Reserve, what kind of activities do you engage in? Check all that apply. - Selected Choice`) %>%
mutate(activity = strsplit(`When you visit the GTM Research Reserve, what kind of activities do you engage in? Check all that apply. - Selected Choice`, ",")) %>% 
  unnest(activity) %>% 
  mutate(value = 1)  %>% 
  group_by(activity) %>% 
  summarise(n_activity = sum(value)) %>% 
  ggplot() +
    aes(reorder(activity, n_activity), n_activity) +
    geom_col() +
  coord_flip()


```
